summary: AN ORDINANCE amending The City of Seattle's 1975 Plan for Criminal Justice to include the Felony Warrant Service Project and the Pre Anti-Fencing Project; authorizing grant contracts for implementation of the above projects; establishing one additional position of Clerk-Typist II in the Police Department; reappropriating the unexpended and unencumbered balances of funds appropriated by Ordinances 104362, 104821, 104994 and 105081; making a reimbursable appropriation from the Emergency Fund and declaring the emergency therefor.
